 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/588fe1bba05ee967177a6ea7d454034c515543028.gif> 	

We wrap up the week with three ExCom members who connect our customers, protects our Group's interests, and bring our strategy to life around the region — Amit, Nada, and Fadi.

Watch the videos here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1331&user=10620>  and remember to submit your questions anonymously in advance here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1332&user=10620> .​

Watch the videos here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1331&user=10620>  and remember to submit your questions anonymously in advance here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1332&user=10620> .​
Register here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1333&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1331&user=10620> 	




Amit highlights how our new cross-functional initiative, THINKOMNI, will enhance our omnichannel experience across five key pillars, and the importance of the technologies we will introduce to shape the future of the Group as part of our 10-year strategy.







Nada shares how AI is reshaping the Legal function across multiple workstreams, and what we can expect from the Legal team in the second half of the year.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1331&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1331&user=10620> 	







Fadi touches on the role of country managers in translating the Group's strategy into local execution, and how we’re building success by staying close to our customers, teams, and market realities.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/bdf70a943e752449d658e884bc35af61608590944.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

The Voice of the Business (VoB) initiative is back

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/4e6d0adf2c1df0efa1793a46a8b19240581754140.png>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/bdf70a943e752449d658e884bc35af61608590944.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

The Voice of the Business (VoB) initiative is back

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/4e6d0adf2c1df0efa1793a46a8b19240581754140.png> 	

The Voice of the Business (VoB) is designed with the aim to LISTEN to your voice, your feedback on our Group’s Support Services and ACT upon it. 

But why is it that important to share YOUR feedback? 

Because your participation ensures the results are accurate and truly reflective of our Group’s experience - making the insights more relevant and actionable for every one of our support services. 

You will receive an email in your inbox with a personal link to the survey which will only take you 5 to 10 minutes to complete. We rely on each one of you who will receive the Voice of the Business Survey to support this process and help deliver best-in-class operations to our team members and partners across the Group. Please make sure you are familiar with the Group’s services prior to taking this survey here.  

Stay tuned for our upcoming webinars! If you have any inquiries, please reach out to voiceofthebusiness@chalhoub.com

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

THE DEAL X Mulberry | Exclusive Sale

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1334&user=10620> 	




Exclusive sale of up to 70% for Chalhoub Group team members from 23-26 June! Online only
